last_episode_to_air.name: There Goes the Neighbors' Hood
last_episode_to_air.overview: Larry must decide where he wants to live when he finds out he's pregnant; new visitors arrive in the neighborhood.

name: The Neighbors
overview: When the Weavers move to a gated community in New Jersey, they discover that the entire neighborhood is comprised of aliens from the planet Zabvron. But as the Weavers and the aliens face the struggles of everyday life together, they discover that some things -- the ups and downs of marriage, the desire to be a good parent and raise a happy family -- are universal. Intergalactic, even.
tagline: A down to earth family comedy.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: Marty Weaver just wants the best for his wife, Debbie, and their three kids. That's why he's moving them to Hidden Hills, New Jersey, a gated community complete with its own golf course.

episodes.name: Journey to the Center of the Mall
episodes.overview: After convincing the Bird-Kersees to let their kids try "human" school, the Weavers take them on their first excursion outside Hidden Hills - shopping for back-to-school clothes at the mall. They survived the trip to Earth, but will the mall be too much? Meanwhile, Debbie and Jackie have doubts about each other's true intentions.

episodes.name: Things Just Got Real
episodes.overview: Marty and Debbie decide to make plans with their human friends after Larry and Jackie have become too entangled in their daily lives. The Weavers do their best to un-invite the Bird-Kersees, explaining they're afraid their friends won't be accepting of the aliens. But that doesn't stop Larry and Jackie from crashing Marty's' poker night and Debbie's girls' night on the town -- with hilarious results.

episodes.name: Bathroom Etiquette
episodes.overview: Marty and Debbie prepare the Bird-Kersees for their kids' first day of human school. They're especially worried that little Dick Butkus will get picked on, but their anti-bullying advice backfires in ways they never anticipated. Meanwhile, Larry and Jackie are getting tired of the Weavers' endless parenting tips.

episodes.name: Halloween-ween
episodes.overview: Since arriving on Earth, the aliens - led by the Bird-Kersees - have viewed Halloween as a threat and have set up a barrier at the gates of Hidden Hills to prevent children dressed in costumes from entering the community. The Weavers, on the other hand, are excited about their first Halloween in the suburbs and want to open the gates of the community to celebrate. They do their best to explain the ritual of trick-or-treating to the aliens. Meanwhile, Marty and Debbie's fears are realized when Amber, Max and Abby reject their family costume plans.

episodes.name: Larry Bird and the Iron Throne
episodes.overview: Jackie tries to help Debbie plan Abby's birthday; Larry shadows Lenny at work; Reggie tries to find a gift for Amber.

episodes.name: 50 Shades of Green
episodes.overview: Debbie and Marty find out more about alien love when the Zabvronian mating season begins; a cute jock asks Amber to a makeout party.

episodes.name: Thanksgiving is for the Bird-Kersees
episodes.overview: Debbie asks Marty to rescind his parents' invitation to Thanksgiving dinner so they can have Jackie, Larry, Reggie and Dick over instead.

episodes.name: Merry Crap-Mas
episodes.overview: Marty and Debbie dislike the kids' entitled attitude toward Christmas and decide to return the gifts and use the money for a family vacation; when the Weavers realize the aliens already opened all the presents, Larry Bird must save Christmas.

episodes.name: Juan of the Dead
episodes.overview: When the neighborhood gardener dies, forcing Debbie and Marty to explain death to the aliens, Larry Bird decides to solve the problem.

episodes.name: Gingerbread Man
episodes.overview: Larry Bird helps Debbie deal with PTA politics and its officious president, Linda; Jackie's competitive nature kicks in when she helps Marty coach soccer.

episodes.name: Cold War
episodes.overview: When the whole Weaver family comes down with a cold, the Bird-Kersees -- especially Larry -- are terrified and confused.

episodes.name: Dream Weavers
episodes.overview: At the school dance Reggie attempts to win over Amber, Debbie tries to recapture the magic of her first encounter with Marty, and Jackie hopes to be romanced by Larry.

episodes.name: The Back Nine
episodes.overview: The Weavers and Bird-Kersees are confronted with class and race issues as they compete for membership in an exclusive new country club.

episodes.name: Space Invaders
episodes.overview: Debbie advises Reggie to commit to Giselle so he proposes marriage, which incites Jackie's wrath. Meanwhile Amber decides to break up with her boyfriend.

episodes.name: Mother Clubbers
episodes.overview: Debbie and Jackie go to a hip new club in hope of feeling more desirable; Marty and Larry Bird come to Amber for makeovers.

episodes.name: Larry Bird Presents an Oscar-Winnin...
episodes.overview: Obsessed with winning an Oscar, Larry and Reggie decide to videotape a spelling bee in which Max and Dick Butkus go head-to-head.

episodes.name: Camping
episodes.overview: When the Weavers and Bird-Kersees go camping, Marty tries to prove that he is manly like his dad; the families have an encounter with an animal.

episodes.name: I Believe I Can Drive
episodes.overview: Marty offers to teach the Bird-Kersees how to drive; Amber regrets opting for lessons from a driver's ed teacher when Ms. Porsche turns out to be very unconventional.

episodes.name: Sing Like a Larry Bird
episodes.overview: After the Bird-Kersees go see a Broadway show, Larry decides to create a musical of his own; an emergency phone call could expose the Bird-Kersees' true identities.

episodes.name: Mo Purses Mo Money Mo Problems
episodes.overview: Debbie is ecstatic when a businesswoman offers to help revitalize her purse business; Jackie jumps in to help, but soon she and Debbie realize they are in way over their heads.

episodes.name: It Has Begun...
episodes.overview: During a trip to Atlantic City, Marty learns that Larry can count cards -- and see through them; Jackie confesses that she has always wanted a human wedding; Dick Butkus receives an ominous call from his grandpa.

episodes.name: Family Conference
episodes.overview: Reggie and Amber tell their families about their relationship; a surprise guest competes for Reggie's affection.

episodes.name: September Fools
episodes.overview: After learning about April Fools' Day, Larry plans to prank the Weavers; Jackie helps Reggie try to convince Amber that he isn't interested in his Zabvronian soulmate.

episodes.name: The Neighbours
episodes.overview: Ever since the Joyner-Kersee family has been cut off financially, Jackie secretly got a job at a Mexican restaurant; Jackie invites her boss over in hope of getting a promotion, but things don't go as planned.

episodes.name: The One with Interspecies Friends
episodes.overview: Jackie and Debbie get makeovers by Shirley at Jackie's favorite hair salon; Reggie and Amber bond over nature programming; Dick tries to get Marty in shape.

episodes.name: Challoweenukah
episodes.overview: Larry wants to combine his favorite holidays, Chanukkah and Halloween; Marty and Debbie are challenged to a costume contest.

episodes.name: Any Friggin' Sunday
episodes.overview: Debbie focuses on Amber and Reggie's relationship as football season consumes the rest of the household; Larry tries to replace golf with football.

episodes.name: We Jumped the Shark (Tank)
episodes.overview: When Debbie creates a unique purse, Jackie gets them booked on "Shark Tank"; Amber choreographs Abby's dance for a big recital.

episodes.name: Good Debbie Hunting
episodes.overview: Debbie wants to enroll in business school but first must pass a qualifying exam; Reggie and Amber's relationship is tested.

episodes.name: Thanksgiving is No Schmuck Bait
episodes.overview: Marty's father visits unexpectedly with stunning news, dashing Debbie and Marty's hopes for an uneventful Thanksgiving; Jackie's parents learn about human relationships.

episodes.name: Supreme Like Me
episodes.overview: A rift is caused when Jackie's parents help Debbie and Marty with a burst water pipe; Larry increases his efforts to find a job.

episodes.name: A Christmas Story
episodes.overview: When Debbie accidentally spoils Larry's Christmas surprise for Dick, Larry retaliates; Amber and Reggie try to get each other the perfect present.

episodes.name: Fear and Loving in New Jersey
episodes.overview: Debbie and Marty teach the Bird-Kersees self-defense; Larry wants to build panic room.

episodes.name: High School Reunion
episodes.overview: Marty and Debbie prepare for their high school reunion, where Debbie will face her arch nemesis and Marty and his high school band perform.

episodes.name: Man, Actually
episodes.overview: Debbie faces a flirtatious professor at school; Amber mourns her relationship with Reggie; Larry and Reggie's Zabvronian cycles leave them emotional wrecks.

episodes.name: You've Lost That Larry Feeling
episodes.overview: Debbie's maternal instincts take over when she hosts her college study group; for the first time, Larry experiences jealousy; Reggie and Amber make a decision.

episodes.name: Oscar Party
episodes.overview: Debbie finally joins a popular social media outlet and starts friending her old friends from Bayonne. Because she and Marty have lost touch, the Weavers decide to throw an Oscar party and invite everyone to reconnect. When the Bird-Kersees hear about the festivities, they decide to make themselves indispensable to the Weavers by turning the house into the most lavish, over-the-top Oscar party.

episodes.name: Balle Balle
episodes.overview: Marty and Debbie are worried when Larry Bird tells them his Indian co-worker at the coffee shop has invited him to a traditional Indian wedding. Despite their pleas, Larry decides to attend without their approval and he and Jackie get carried away when trying to come up with a wedding gift. After Larry does research on Indian weddings, he concludes all weddings take place in "Bollywood" and decides to give his friend a full scale Bollywood number.

episodes.name: A Night in (Lou Ferrigno's Hibachi) Heaven
episodes.overview: Marty plans a date night that isn't what Debbie envisioned; Dick falls for the new baby sitter.

episodes.name: Uncle Benjamin
episodes.overview: Debbie's estranged mother invites the Weavers to her timeshare in San Diego so they can meet her newly adopted 10-year-old son; Marty tries to help Abby overcome her fear of the ocean.

episodes.name: Close Encounters of the Bird Kind
episodes.overview: Marty and Debbie love their new Friday night bowling league but Debbie is terrible and the other two teammates ask Marty to kick her off the team. Meanwhile, when word gets out that the alien colony is getting a little too Americanized, Larry's father sends an ominous figure to possibly take over the mission.

episodes.name: All That Jazzy Jeff
episodes.overview: Larry's brother DJ Jazzy Jeff visits in the hopes of bringing everyone home to Zabvron; Amber admits to having a boyfriend.

episodes.name: There Goes the Neighbors' Hood
episodes.overview: Larry must decide where he wants to live when he finds out he's pregnant; new visitors arrive in the neighborhood.
